description: The focus of an observation when not the patient of record  (i.e different from Observation.subject).   For example, the focal subject may be a fetus, or a donor.

element.comments: Use Observation.specimen element to describe the specimen.  Only used if not implicit in code found in Observation.code.
element.definition: The focus of an observation when not the patient of record  (i.e different from Observation.subject).   For example, the focal subject may be a fetus, or a donor.

binding.description: codes for observation targets.  Derived from from both HL7 v3 and SNOMED CT code systems

name: Focal Subject
